HEX is an ERC20 token designed and launched by Richard Heart on 2 December 2019 on the Ethereum network. HEX is designed to be a store of value to replace the Certificate of Deposit as the blockchain counterpart of that financial product used in traditional financial markets.
By setting the appropriate cookie, this extension allows you enable your 10% HEX bonus while you transform ETH in the Lobby.
